Detailed Description

ApoxiThread is the abstract base class for all threads which provide an ExecutionContext. It is derived from class Thread and therefore it maps to one operating system thread.
Currently two implementations exist:
  • AppContainer
    An application container holds a number of applications which share the processing time of this thread.
  • ServiceThread
    A service thread exclusively uses the whole processing time of this thread.
